properties.entry:
SELECT /*com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.ReviewDAO#selectAllReviewList()*/ A.REVIEW_NO , A.REVIEW_TITLE , A.REVIEW_BODY , A.REVIEW_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.REVIEW_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.REVIEW_DISPLAY , A.REVIEW_ORDER_NO FROM MG_REVIEW A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.REVIEW_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
ORDER BY A.REVIEW_NO DESC
